title: Chasm Guide

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Red) each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.
- (Red)(3): All other Gatherers will be allowed to Generate and use another ability this night. This takes effect immediately.

desc:
Post 1893
*With a single act of bravery, she went from expendable to indispensable.*
